{{/* huge/env/When Returns a bool when testing a string: never: false always: true {env}: true @author @regisphilibert @context Map (.) @access private @returns Bool @example - Go Template {{ with partialCached "When" "production" "production" }} Yes let's do it! {{ end }} */}} {{ $return := false }} {{ if eq $ "never" }} {{ $return = false }} {{ else if eq $ "always" }} {{ $return = true }} {{ else }} {{ $return = partialCached "huge/env/Is" $ $ }} {{ end }} {{ return $return }}
